data.title: Oceanside Union Free School District
data.meta_description: Home - Oceanside Union Free School District
data.text:
Congrats to our 6th graders. Photo from #3 ceremony.

Flag Day at School #5

WTG Track and Field Team - Nassau Champs!!

Congratulations to our Softball Nassau Champs!!

School #8 students visit the district's outdoor research center.

School #4 students visit the Nassau Museum of Art

Families attended the districtwide Arts Festival on April 16.

Hedy Page, a street painter who escaped the Holocaust, spoke to OHS students.

A School #2 student shares a hug with Holocaust survivor Edith Gross

School #6 students choose books at PTA book fair.

OMS' 3x3 basketball tournament raised funds for charity.

#9E students perform in"Dear Edwina"

Castleton students attended a mindfulness workshop.

Congratulations to our music educators and students!

School #3 fourth graders visited the OSD research center in the arboretum.

It's always fun when the circus comes to school!

OHS' Beauty and the Beast

School #5 under the sea with the LIttle Mermaid

Speaker Amberley Snyder with students at Human Relations Day.

School #5 students debate the fairness of Hammurabi's Code

School #2 students at Jones Beach Energy & Nature Ctr.

OHS students traveled abroad to Italy, France, Spain & Japan!

Team Spirit at OMS celebrated decades with music and dancing.

School #9E on the 100th day of school

OHS students commemorate Black History Month in morning announcements.

The Literary Magazine Club has won two national awards for school magazine "Serendipity."

School #3's performance of Moana

OMS' production of Frozen Jr.

Willy Wonka Jr. visited three schools and had two shows at OHS.

Castleton students read aloud at School #6 to foster community

Best Buddies & PE Dept. organize 2nd annual Glo Bowl

Student Athletes in Service to Others help package trees for troops

School #5 Sixth Graders participated in a day of service.

OHS and Uniondale students collaborate on communication skills.

School #4 Unveils Playground Communication Board

School #6 New Universal Playground is Open!

Congrats to OHS Thespians on their 1st show of 2023-24.

The Outdoor Research Center in the Arboretum, developed by OHS Castleton students and staff.

Wishing all of our students a great year!
